category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_current_role
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether the user's membership in a role enforces access to objects. Valid Values: true - A member of the role has access to an object only when the role is that user's current role. false - A member of the role has access to an object even when the role is not the user's current role.
